b"@LuoshengPeng What is the Vertex $3B acquisition. I've said for a long time they may buy $PRVB. JDRF fund Chairman is on Provention's board and he put together their Semma acquisition for $1B for their pre-clinical asset that ultimately will need Teplizumab to preserve cell function."

b'Sold 1/3 of my oversized $EIGR position on this run.  Used $ to buy back the $PRVB I sold earlier this week (BLA acceptance and priority rev due), and added to $LIFE (covid data due) and $TCON.'

b'$prvb is an interesting company. I like the data and odds of approval seem almost guaranteed for delaying onset of t1d, however the commercialization plan details need more clarity. What\xe2\x80\x99s their sales team and strategy? Good for a pdufa run up in my opinion play to low 20s'

b'$PRVB https://t.co/2Ga9IutXED Provention Bio Inc The engine judges the value of this company has an undetermined short term setup and its stock price is in line with its long term fundamentals #money #stockmarket #trader'

b'Ok - first, a *quick* history lesson - in the last ~3 months, I have been increasingly obsessed w/ learning about monoclonal antibodies. It started as a simple pattern recognition that a lot of the biotechs I was investing in were in this space - $HGEN $PRVB $MGNX $ONCT etc.'
